bs-smwconnector-propertyvalueprovider-us: User pages of the users that have been mentioned on this page
apihelp-bs-smw-connector-ask-store-summa: ExtJS-compatible store to execute semantic queries
apihelp-bs-smw-connector-ask-store-props: Properties to be retrieved. Those properties will correspond to the schema and data returned. Key-value pairs, key is the actual property name, value is desired label (JSON)
bs-smw-connector-async-ask-unknown-handl: Handler for format "$1" is not registered or not valid
apihelp-bs-smw-connector-ask-tree-store-: Node value that will replace <nowiki>{{{node}}}</nowiki> placeholder in the query
apihelp-bs-smw-connector-smw-property-st: ExtJS-compatible store to get property values
apihelp-bs-smw-connector-tree-ask-store-: ExtJS-compatible tree store to execute semantic queries
bs-smwconnector-dataquery-desc: Enables queries on content in the wiki
bs-smwconnector-dataquery-category-help: Filter by category(ies), separating multiple entries with '|'. E.g. 'cat1|cat2' returns pages in categories 'cat1' OR 'cat2'.
bs-smwconnector-dataquery-namespace-help: Filter by namespace(s), separating multiple entries with '|'. E.g. 'ns1|ns2' returns pages in namespaces 'ns1' OR 'ns2'.
bs-smwconnector-dataquery-printouts-help: Display property(ies), separating multiple entries with '|'. E.g. 'prop1|prop2' returns the 'prop1' & 'prop2' property values of the page.
bs-smwconnector-dataquery-count-help: Limit the number of result(s) returned
bs-smwconnector-decision-overview-catego: Filter by one or multiple categories, separating multiple entries with '|'.
bs-smwconnector-decision-overview-namesp: Filter by one or multiple namespaces, separating multiple entries with '|'.
bs-smwconnector-decision-overview-prefix: Filter by own prefix(es), separating multiple entries with '|'.
bs-smwconnector-decision-overview-no-res: No decisions found with current filters
bs-smwconnector-decision-overview-drople: Enables queries to get an overview of decisions
